item.title: Lunchtime Walks on Quarantine
item.description: Things have become very busy for me over the last couple of weeks. I’ve been given primary streaming and video responsibilities for our church during the lockdown, all the while ramping up for a new gig at my job, and working on an interesting side project as well ‚Äî a product shoot for a friend at church who is opening up an Etsy store. (On a side note, I’ve never done anything like that and was honored that she even asked.

item.title: Corona Virus Rap - Gmac Cash
item.description: While I’m at it I might as well post this, too, since Josh got such a kick out of it. I sent this to him a week or so ago, then days later he’s in the hospital. Great timing on my part. Maybe he didn’t follow soon enough the sober and thoughtful advice given in this video. Get well, my brother.

item.title: The Covid-19 Blues
item.description: Just got this from my brother, who at this moment is being hospitalized in Louisiana for pneumonia and possible coronavirus infection. Still awaiting results of his 2nd test. Hasn’t killed his sense of humor. We love you, Josh. Get well.

item.title: This Soft Jazz Will Cure Your Coronavirus
item.description: I guess it’s true that there really is a jazz for every conceivable mood or situation.
